data.name: Tower of Guardian
data.detailed_description:
Tower of Guardian is an 2D fantasy platformer RPG. It tells about the adventures of a young woman named Liszt Arc. Once upon a time , Listz Arc as princess of light wizard , the princess from Aluria Kingdom, want to search her friend from a mysterious tower called "Tower of Darkness" which is possessed with darkness that makes eternal rain and caused calamity in Aluria Kingdom , but she never knows what inside it.

Key Features:
EMBRACE THE SKILLS
Make your way through the game to find a new various skills !

TIME SIMULATION
playing with in game time simulation like in real world , consists , 30 days each month , and 12 months each year

UNLOCK SECRETS AND VARIOUS BOSS
play and explore the dungeon with various secret and various boss.

QUEST LOG
playing with Quest log features ! , consists main and side quests.

EXPLORE A LARGE WORLD
6 floors in the tower along with 2 extra stories. A random generated forest extra stage and other mini games area on the sky and under the water

PVP COLISEUM
a special arena where you can compete against other players! A fun way to unwind as you progress through the story!

data.short_description: Tower of Guardian , is 2D Fantasy Platformer RPG, tells about adventure of a wizard princess from Kingdom called "Aluria" exploring The Tower of Darkness

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP SP3 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E6600 or equivalent
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: HD Intel Graphics 4000
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX9c compliant
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 or higher
  • Processor: Intel i3 or higher
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® 8800 GT (512 MB) or ATI™ Radeon™ HD 4850 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX9c compliant
